list_definition.definition: relating to times long ago, especially before the collapse of Rome

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Why are you wearing that ancient sweater? It’s full of holes.

No looking back to the ancients for authority and reassurance here.

As a few far-sighted analysts saw as early as 1946, the rules of the ancient game of war were changing.
